content.body:
notes from today's call:
- start google doc to draft response to execom
- identify & investige ecma bylaws/policies related to funding request / consensus seeking
- setup discussion on CoC

content.body: Hey all, your local chair checking in.  I was going to ask for your advice on Michael's mail.  It sounds like you have the ball so the chairs' will await your joint response - sending something to the chairs mailing list is the best way to ensure visibility.  Please keep in mind we don't have much time to prepare any plenary session prior to the June GA.  Monday 30th is a US holiday.  Thursday/Friday are UK holidays.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Hey all, your local chair checking in.  I was going to ask for your advice on Michael's mail.  It sounds like you have the ball so the chairs' will await your joint response - sending something to the chairs mailing list is the best way to ensure visibility.  Please keep in mind we don't have much time to prepare any plenary session prior to the June GA.  Monday 30th is a US holiday.  Thursday/Friday are UK holidays.

content.body: Hi Rob! We did have a good discussion this morning, the plan is to wrote up our thoughts next week, and then can we circle up with the chairs? The holiday schedule does make that tricky though, so likely we may need to target late Tuesday or Wednesday for that.
